data.comment: The match has started.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Markus Schmidt.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Frankfurt.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Frankfurt at Volkswagen Arena.
Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Markus Schmidt waits before resuming play because John Brooks for Wolfsburg is still down.
In the minute 6, John Brooks is back on his feet again.
Markus Schmidt signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Frankfurt's half.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Markus Schmidt.
In the minute 8, Wolfsburg are caught offside.
Xaver Schlager hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Wolfsburg for Wolfsburg.
Throw-in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Frankfurt needs to be cautious. Wolfsburg have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of Frankfurt.
In the minute 15, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Wolfsburg close to the penalty box.
Evan N`Dicka for Frankfurt has been booked by Markus Schmidt and receives a first yellow card.
Wolfsburg's Maximilian Arnold misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 16, It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolfsburg.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Markus Schmidt awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg's Kevin Mbabu goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Josip Brekalo (Wolfsburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 24, Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Frankfurt's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Frankfurt in Wolfsburg.
At Volkswagen Arena, Frankfurt are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 26, Djibril Sow of Frankfurt smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Frankfurt to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Wolfsburg pushes forward through Wout Weghorst, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Frankfurt.
Wolfsburg's Josip Brekalo is on target but unsuccessful.
Filip Kostic (Frankfurt) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 29, Frankfurt drive upfield and Djibril Sow gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Wolfsburg defender.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Markus Schmidt.
Markus Schmidt signals a throw-in for Frankfurt, close to Wolfsburg's area.
In the minute 32, Frankfurt are whistled for offside.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Frankfurt territory.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Wolfsburg.
Markus Schmidt signals a Frankfurt throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
In the minute 36, Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
In the minute 39, Frankfurt's Erik Durm gets in a shot on goal at Volkswagen Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Wolfsburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Frankfurt have a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Wolfsburg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Frankfurt.
Wolfsburg's Maxence Lacroix has been booked in Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Markus Schmidt.
Wolfsburg drives forward and Maximilian Arnold gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
The first-half is over at Volkswagen Arena.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Markus Schmidt awards Wolfsburg a goal kick.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Frankfurt.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Wolfsburg close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Frankfurt at Volkswagen Arena.
Markus Schmidt awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Markus Schmidt awards the away team a throw-in.
Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Frankfurt at Volkswagen Arena.
In the minute 54, Bas Dost gets his shot on target but fails to score for Frankfurt.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to Frankfurt.
In the minute 55, Frankfurt's Filip Kostic breaks free at Volkswagen Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
In Wolfsburg, Wolfsburg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 57, In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Volkswagen Arena, Josip Brekalo has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Frankfurt.
An attacking Frankfurt player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
John Brooks (Wolfsburg) has received a yellow card from Markus Schmidt.
In the minute 63, Goal! Bas Dost gives Frankfurt the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 0-1.
Can Wolfsburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Frankfurt's half?
Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
In the minute 66, Frankfurt to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Frankfurt's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 70, Throw-in high up the field for Wolfsburg in Wolfsburg.
Oliver Glasner is making the team's first substitution at Volkswagen Arena with Bartosz Bialek replacing Josip Brekalo.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Markus Schmidt.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg's Maximilian Arnold is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 75, Frankfurt have a goal kick.
Wolfsburg have been given a penalty...
The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Wout Weghorst.
In the minute 78, Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bartosz Bialek (Wolfsburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Can Wolfsburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Frankfurt's half?
Markus Schmidt awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to Wolfsburg.
Kevin Mbabu of Wolfsburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Frankfurt at Volkswagen Arena.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of Wolfsburg.
Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Wolfsburg's Xaver Schlager has been booked in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 83, Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Sebastian Rode with Aymen Barkok.
Danny Da Costa is on a sub for Erik Durm for Frankfurt.
In the minute 87, Markus Schmidt signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Wolfsburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Wout Weghorst (Wolfsburg) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 88, Wout Weghorst is on target to give Wolfsburg a 2-1 advantage.
Xaver Schlager instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 89, Markus Schmidt signals a Frankfurt throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Throw-in Frankfurt.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in the half of Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Adi Hutter (Frankfurt) is making a third substitution, with Amin Younes replacing Stefan Ilsanker.
Felix Klaus is replacing Maximilian Philipp for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Bas Dost (Frankfurt) has received a yellow card from Markus Schmidt.
The home team have replaced Ridle Baku with William. This is the third substitution made today by Oliver Glasner.
